description: Detects the image load of vss_ps.dll by uncommon executables using OriginalFileName datapoint
name: Image Load of VSS_PS.dll by Uncommon Executable
query: (file.path:*\\vss_ps.dll AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\svchost.exe OR *\\msiexec.exe OR *\\vssvc.exe OR *\\srtasks.exe OR *\\tiworker.exe OR *\\dllhost.exe OR *\\searchindexer.exe OR *dismhost.exe OR *taskhostw.exe OR *\\clussvc.exe OR *\\thor64.exe OR *\\thor.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\inetsrv\\iissetup.exe) AND process.executable:*c\:\\windows\\*)))
author: Markus Neis
@markus_neis
